SCAN_LOG_PROCESS_STARTED.description: Message send the moment scan process has been initiated.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_TOKEN.description: Message send before checking facebook login.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_TOKEN_ERROR.description: Error message send when user is not logged in to Facebook.

SCAN_LOG_PAGE_CONTENT.description: Getting content of the facebook.com page

SCAN_LOG_PAGE_CONTENT_ERROR.description: Error getting content of the facebook.com page.

SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_REQUEST.description: Making request to facebook birthdays endpoint.

SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_REQUEST_ERROR.description: Failed to make request to facebook birthdays endpoint.

SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_CONTENT.description: Making request to facebook birthdays endpoint.

SCAN_LOG_BIRTHDAYS_CONTENT_ERROR.description: Failed to make request to facebook birthdays endpoint.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_BIRTHDAYS.description: Starting birthdays extraction from fetched data.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_BIRTHDAYS_ERROR.message: Failed to extract birthdays from fetched data.
SCAN_LOG_EXTRACT_BIRTHDAYS_ERROR.description: Error while extracting birthdays from fetched data.

SCAN_LOG_MERGING_BIRTHDAYS.message: Merging newly scanned birthday with already existing data.
SCAN_LOG_MERGING_BIRTHDAYS.description: Message send before merging of newly scanned birthdays with old data.

SCAN_LOG_STORING_EXTRACTED_BIRTHDAYS.description: Message send before storing extracted birthdays to local storage.

SCAN_LOG_PROCESS_DONE.description: Message send after extraction process is done.
